patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index 24fdcd6..e478605 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -25,7 +25,7 @@
     "countries-and-timezones": "^3.4.1",
     "devworkspace-operator": "https://github.com/devfile/devworkspace-operator#main",
     "eclipse-che-operator": "https://github.com/eclipse-che/che-operator#main",
-    "execa": "^5.1.1",
+    "execa": "^8.0.1",
     "fancy-test": "^2.0.25",
     "fs-extra": "^11.1.0",
     "getos": "^3.2.1",
diff --git a/src/commands/server/deploy.ts b/src/commands/server/deploy.ts
index 7a52c9b..fc09cf7 100644
--- a/src/commands/server/deploy.ts
+++ b/src/commands/server/deploy.ts
@@ -96,7 +96,7 @@ import {
 } from '../../utils/command-utils'
 import {CommonTasks} from '../../tasks/common-tasks'
 import {CheTasks} from '../../tasks/che-tasks'
-import {newListr} from '../../utils/utls'
+import { newListr } from '../../utils/lists'
 import {Che} from '../../utils/che'
 
 export default class Deploy extends Command {
diff --git a/src/commands/server/update.ts b/src/commands/server/update.ts
index 9e999ed..3949519 100644
--- a/src/commands/server/update.ts
+++ b/src/commands/server/update.ts
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@
 
 import { Command, Flags } from '@oclif/core'
 import { ux } from '@oclif/core'
-import * as semver from 'semver'
+import semver from 'semver'
 
 import {
   CheCtlContext,
diff --git a/src/tasks/platforms/crc.ts b/src/tasks/platforms/crc.ts
index 9f16e61..b143e53 100644
--- a/src/tasks/platforms/crc.ts
+++ b/src/tasks/platforms/crc.ts
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
  *   Red Hat, Inc. - initial API and implementation
  */
 
-import * as execa from 'execa'
+import { execa } from 'execa'
 import * as Listr from 'listr'
 
 import {CheCtlContext} from '../../context'
diff --git a/src/tasks/platforms/docker-desktop.ts b/src/tasks/platforms/docker-desktop.ts
index 5f20919..33b7281 100644
--- a/src/tasks/platforms/docker-desktop.ts
+++ b/src/tasks/platforms/docker-desktop.ts
@@ -85,7 +85,7 @@ export namespace DockerDesktopTasks {
   async function enableNginxIngress(execTimeout = 30_000): Promise<void> {
     const version = 'controller-v1.1.0'
     const genericCommand = `kubectl apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/${version}/deploy/static/provider/cloud/deploy.yaml`
-    await execa(genericCommand, { timeout: execTimeout, shell: true })
+    await execaCommand(genericCommand, { timeout: execTimeout, shell: true })
   }
 
   function grabIps(): string[] {
diff --git a/src/tasks/platforms/microk8s.ts b/src/tasks/platforms/microk8s.ts
index 9d265ba..501c0de 100644
--- a/src/tasks/platforms/microk8s.ts
+++ b/src/tasks/platforms/microk8s.ts
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
  *   Red Hat, Inc. - initial API and implementation
  */
 
-import * as execa from 'execa'
+import { execa } from 'execa'
 import * as Listr from 'listr'
 
 import {CheCtlContext} from '../../context'
@@ -63,7 +63,7 @@ export namespace MicroK8sTasks {
   }
 
   async function isMicroK8sRunning(): Promise<boolean> {
-    const { exitCode } = await execa('microk8s.status', { timeout: 10_000, reject: false })
+    const { exitCode } = await execa('microk8s.status', [], { timeout: 10_000, reject: false })
     return exitCode === 0
   }
 
diff --git a/src/tasks/platforms/minikube.ts b/src/tasks/platforms/minikube.ts
index cef433f..82415b5 100644
--- a/src/tasks/platforms/minikube.ts
+++ b/src/tasks/platforms/minikube.ts
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
  *   Red Hat, Inc. - initial API and implementation
  */
 
-import * as execa from 'execa'
+import { execa } from 'execa'
 import * as Listr from 'listr'
 import {CheCtlContext, OIDCContext} from '../../context'
 import { KubeClient } from '../../api/kube-client'
diff --git a/src/utils/command-utils.ts b/src/utils/command-utils.ts
index 24e8347..39adacc 100644
--- a/src/utils/command-utils.ts
+++ b/src/utils/command-utils.ts
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ import {getProjectName, newError} from './utls'
 import {CheCtlContext, CliContext} from '../context'
 import * as fs from 'node:fs'
 import {EclipseChe} from '../tasks/installers/eclipse-che/eclipse-che'
-import * as execa from 'execa'
+import { execa } from 'execa'
 import * as path from 'node:path'
 import {CheCtlVersion} from './chectl-version'
 
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ export async function askForChectlUpdateIfNeeded(): Promise<void> {
     ux.info(`A more recent version of chectl is available. To deploy the latest version of ${EclipseChe.PRODUCT_NAME}, update the chectl tool first.`)
     if (await ux.confirm('Do you want to update chectl now? [y/n]')) {
       const bin = path.join(__dirname, '..', '..', 'bin', getProjectName())
-      await execa(bin, ['update'], {stdout: 'inherit', stderr: 'inherit', timeout: 60_000})
+      await execa(bin, ['update'], {stdio: 'inherit', timeout: 60_000})
       ux.exit(0)
     }
   }
